messages.subject: Re: Newbies
messages.msgSnippet: Why? If your son was in school, the district would be
messages.messageBody:
<<I'm trying to see the light at the end of the tunnel when Robby won't
gravitate towards the computer.>>

Why? If your son was in school, the district would be paying big bucks to
have the equipment available in an attempt to have him be computer literate
at age 7. It is a big selling point for school districts.

The computer is bringing the entire world into your child's space. What a
wonderful gift.

Julie

messages.subject: Newbies
messages.msgSnippet: I feel the calling to let everyone new to the list or any other list, know that you do not have to read every piece of email that appears on the list. It is OK
messages.messageBody:
I feel the calling to let everyone new to the list or any other list, know
that you
do not have to read every piece of email that appears on the list.
It is OK to only read whats addressed to you, or what appeals to
your interests.
DON'T BE AFRAID TO HIT THE DELETE KEY!!!

This is the secret to belonging to more than one list.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
